content: All users will be added to {{productName}} with the selected type.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that explains how selecting an LDAP user type will add users to a specific product, in this case {{productName}}. It appears as a hover text or tooltip when the "LdapUserType" option is selected, providing context for end-users.

usage.context: {t("LdapUsersType")} {t("LdapUserTypeTooltip", { productName: t("Common:ProductName"), })}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in '–a' appears unnecessary and creates an unnatural flow in Azerbaijani. It's not standard practice for indicating 'to' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bütün istifadəçilər seçilmiş növlə {{productName}} əlavə olunacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'adăugate' (added) should agree with the plural subject 'utilizatorii' (users). It should be 'adăugați'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Toți utilizatorii vor fi adăugați în {{productName}} cu tipul selectat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයින්' (parishiilakayin) is a slightly formal term for 'users'. A more common and natural-sounding word might be 'භාවිතකරුවන්' (bhavitakaruwan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලු භාවිතකරුවන් තෝරාගත් වර්ගය සමඟ {{productName}} වෙත එකතු කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure is a bit stiff. A more fluid phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් වර්ගය සමඟ සියලු භාවිතකරුවන් {{productName}} වෙත එක්රැස් කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation uses 'Сви' which can be interpreted as 'all' or 'every'. It might be better to use a word that indicates inclusion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сви корисници биће додани у {{productName}} са одабраним типом.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "所有用户都将使用所选类型添加到{{productName}}。" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'All users will be added to {{productName}} with the selected type.'  '使用' (use) implies the selected type is being *used* by the users, rather than that they are *assigned* a type.  The English sentence implies the selected user type is assigned to the users during the addition process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 所有用户都将以所选类型被添加到{{productName}}。
